name: GIGAZORD! 31" Power Ranger Figure
description: COR BLIMEY! the artwork from the incredible Power Rangers 20th Anniversary show is now up on the Toy Art Gallery website! There's some SPECTACULAR pieces available including our big bad gigazord! The proceeds from the show go to a great cause too - the Boys and Girls Clubs of America. Go Go Check it Out! shop.toyartgallery.com

name: Mighty Wallet!
description: Mighty Wallet Japan LA Artist Series: The Mighty Wallet® is tear-resistant, water-resistant, expandable and recyclable. Made from Tyvek® (think express mail envelopes), these cool wallets resist tearing because of thousands of interlocking plastic fibers spun in random patterns, giving them incredible strength. Dynomighty, makers of Mighty Wallet the original Tyvek® wallet, have partnered with the amazingly radiant kawaii store JapanLA in Los Angeles for an exclusive artist series and pop-up shop. Working with world renowned brands tokidoki, TKDK, and top tier artists 64 Colors, Aya Kakeda, TADO, Luke Chueh, and Camilla d'Errico, they created a limited edition series of wallets that showcase the characteristics surrounding JapanLA. We have a limited number available to buy directly from us. Overseas customers can buy directly from Japan LA Webstore! or Dynomighty Webstore! SPECS JL-006 UPC: 815627012974 + 2 large pockets for cash and receipts. + 2 credit card pockets that expand to hold lots of cards. + 2 quick access business card pockets. + 4 writable Tyvek® business cards included. + open - 8" w x 3.25" h x .125" d + 0.6 oz

name: Gola by TADO Autumn/Winter 2013 'Horror' Bags
description: The Gola x Tado team is back once again for the autumn/winter 2013 season with a classic horror theme. Bats, skeletons, vampires and zombies… The new Gola x Tado collection features a variety of spooky new designs applied to the legendary ‘Redford’ bag silhouette. You can check out the designs and buy online from the Official Gola Store!

name: TADO x 2000AD Judge Death Plush
description: "The Crime Issss Life. The Sentence Issss.......... Hugssss!!" In 2007 we created a cuddly take on one of the Galaxy's most horrible villains for the 2000AD / Judge Dredd 'Zarjaz' exhibition. Now you can have your very own pint-sized piece of pure cuddly evil! Judge Death is produced in collaboration with 2000AD and the wonderful chaps at Unbox Industries Plush Death is 22cm from head to toe and suitable for all ages.

name: TADO x Mathmos Chuppi Light
description: Chuppi is a customisable, colour-changing, portable, re-chargable night light designed by ourselves and the very clever folk at Mathmos. Charge him up and he'll glow and change colour for up to 6 hours. Take the little fella anywhere - he's a great companion on camping trips or sleep overs. Customise Chuppi with pens, paints or break out the re-usable sticker sets that are included in the box! Chuppi is a great gift for both kids and adults - interactive and creative. You can view more information at www.Mathmos.com

name: "Hobbyshop Astro" Wooden Keyrings
description:
Hooray - Lovely charred pieces of MDF that smell great and can be attached to your keys. WOW!
6 different Panda Otaku-related designs
Approx 2"
Each keyring comes packaged in a clear bag with a HobbyShop Astro metallic sticker.
Made in Sheffield Yup Yup!

name: Pixon Camera Pillow Large
description:
As well as a favourite fictitious comic store, Every Panda Otaku needs a favourite fictitious camera shop, and every fictitious camera shop also needs a mascot! Pixon is the official face of Pixon Digital!!

Hand-made pillow cushion. 
Full colour print on upholstery weight twill fabric. 
Stuffed with hypo-allergenic polyester fibre. Super Soft, yet firrrm! 
Embroidered TADO tag.

Size: 35cm(h) x 42cm(w) x 10cm(d) approx.

**Please note: these are HAND MADE with a whole lot-a-love. Each cushion has passed the rigorous FAT ASS bouncing test, however each one is different and there may be tiny wonky bits that add to its 'character!' we're sure you know the score! ;);) **

name: TADO x Hachi Supply Designer Dog Collars and Leashes
description: Hachi Supply is a fantastic new range of designer canine goods for the pumped up pup in your life! The range, put together by designer and hound-fan Mr Shane Jessup, includes collars and leashes from incredible artists Dalek, Tristan Eaton, Seen, Upso.... er, and us! To see the full range, the new season Woof Book, and treat your dog to some AWESOME, check out the Hachi-Supply website.

name: TADO x Uncommon Ipad Cases
description: Hot new customisable ipad cases from the lovely folk at Uncommon - Yey! Check out the full range at www.getuncommon.com

name: TADO x Uncommon Iphone Cases
description: Hot new customisable iphone cases from the lovely folk at Uncommon - Yey! Check out the full range at www.getuncommon.com

name: Signed Noferin Jibibuts Artist Series
description:
Our friends at Noferin asked us to take part in their Artist Series Jibibuts project - YEY!

Jibibuts are simple wooden toys, made from Birch wood.  They are child friendly and approved for 18months + 

These are 'Artist Proofs' and are hand signed and doodled on by our little mitts. We have a limited number of these. 

Size: approx 50x50x90mm

name: 'Pandas of Sheffield' Digital Print
description: Sheffield as you've never seen it before. Originally created as an animated piece for our 'Panda Mania' installation at The Bowery as part of Pubscrawl 2012, this full colour digital print will brighten up the wall of any panda-fan. Plenty local landmarks, characters and references to amuse and perplex. Digitally printed on glossy photo paper by the smashing folk at Evolution Print here in Sheffield. Size: 840mm (w) x 520mm (h)

name: Panda Mania T-Shirt White
description:
Hand-pulled 'Panda Mania' screen printed T-Shirts from the 'Pubscrawl' event in Sheffield, January 2012.

Printed by the good folk at One69a in Manchester using environmentally sound methods, on to Gildan Heavy Cotton T-Shirts.

Sizes:
Youth Large / Womens: W 19" L 25"
Small: W 18" L 28"
Medium: W 20" L 29"
Large: W 22" L 30"

name: Panda Mania Canvas Tote Bag
description:
Show your love of all things Panda and Sheffield and shop in style while you're at it.
Hand-pulled 'Panda Mania' screen printed totes from the 'Pubscrawl' event in Sheffield, January 2012.

Printed by the good folk at One69a in Manchester using environmentally sound methods, on to Canvas Classic Shopper bags.

100% Cotton Canvas - 270gsm (8oz/yd²)
Can be carried by hand or over the shoulder
Dimensions: 42 x 39 x 14 cm
Capacity: 26 Litres

Please note that due to the hand printed nature of the process and the fabric of the bags, there may be minor irregularities that add to the 'character' of the print on these bags ;) ;)

name: Gola by TADO Spring Summer 2012 'Sunshine' wellies
description: The Spring / Summer Gola by TADO range is now available! Team Gola are enjoying the festival season in style with a range of designs inspired by the British love of standing around in muddy fields listening to music with friends. Gola Redford 'Sunshine' wellies UK Sizes 03-08 Available now from the Official Gola Store!

Gola Redford 'Raindrop' wellies UK Sizes 03-08 Available now from the Official Gola Store!

Team Gola are enjoying the festival season in style with a range of designs inspired by the British love of standing around in muddy fields listening to music with friends. Gola Redford 'Party' flipflops UK Sizes 03-08 Available now from the Official Gola Store!

name: Soyu Wisdom 'Tiger Hunter' Tshirt
description: Our good friends at Soyu asked us to collaborate with them on a tee design based on an eastern proverb. We chose the Japanese take on 'Nothing ventured, nothing gained', '虎穴に入らずんば虎子を得ず' or "One may not catch a tiger cub without entering a tiger's liar." Printed on a 100% combed cotton fitted t-shirt, this design is exclusive to the SOYU Wisdom collection and once these limited tees are gone they are gone forever! The tees are available exclusively at the Soyu webstore, please visit Here to purchase - thank you!

name: Funghi 4" Resin Figure
description:
Based on one of the characters from the artwork we created with Aki Oishi for last years Neon 10 Festival held in Dundee Scotland, Funghi is a very special collaborative project between ourselves and the wonderful guys at Creo Design and Fleet Collective!

Limited to just 60 pieces worldwide, Funghi is a 4" polyresin toy. Each is individually numbered and there are an astonishing 35 colourways!
Each box is signed and numbered by ourselves. 
This is a very special release that will not be repeated, once the little Funghu's have flown the nest they'll be gone forever! 

Colourways will be selected at random and we are unable to take requests, sorry!!! That said we guarantee that every colourway's status is fully certified as BAD ASS.
Please note - the Funghi figure itself is individually numbered, but not signed. If you would like yours signing or doodling on, just let us know at: orders@tado.co.uk :):)

Funghi will shipped in a sturdy box. 
All UK orders will be sent by 1st Class Recorded mail and all international orders by standard Air Mail. 
Special Delivery service for UK orders is an additional £3.  
Airsure service (tracked / insured) for international orders is an additional £5.30
If you would like to have one of these delivery options please check out as normal and drop us an email to: orders@tado.co.uk after which we can arrange this for you. Thank you! :):)

name: "Daydream" Vannen Watch
description: Brighten up even the darkest winter morning with a rainbow on your wrist! Produced by Vannen, the quality and attention to detail on these is insane - the domed and over-printed 'glass' and tiny heart engraved on the crown make these really special! They are limited to a run of just 150 pieces. TADO "Daydream" Watch Edition: 150 Wrist: Medium Size - 9.50 Inches Max. Movement: 3 Hand Japanese Quartz. Dial: 34.8mm, Multicolor. Case: 43mm, Plastic, Matte Baby Blue. Crystal: Plastic. Dome. Buckle: Plastic, Matte Yellow. Loop: Plastic, Matte Yellow. Straps: 22mm Wide, Sandwich Strap. We're now sold out of our allocation of these watches, however a few are still available here from www.vannenwatches.com

name: Riding Rascals Art Pass Travel Holder
description:
This fantastic Art Pass is produced by our good friend Mr Matt 'Lunartik' Jones and features a whole host of our favourite characters having fun on 2 wheels. What is an Art Pass?! It's a handy wee wallet for your Oyster, Pasmo, Metro, Business, Subway cards of course! 
They also happen to smell delicious.

Our design was part of a series put together by Lunartik.com, and features work from the following talented artists:

- Lunartik
- Doktor A
- Lou Pimentel
- Pez
- A Little Stranger
- Tortoy
- RWK (Robots will Kill)
- TADO

Limited Edition of only 200 pieces each.
Size: 103mm x 70mm

name: Piggaphunt Phone Charm
description:
The worlds littlest, 6 legged elephant just got even smaller! 
These little guys will spice up your phone, keys, zip, rucksack, pet etc. in more ways than one! 
Not only do they look great, each little 'phunt is actually a little metal bell that makes a happy jingly tinkling noise as you jiggle it!

Size: approx 22mm (excluding strap)

name: TADO-TAT Bumper Pack!
description:
Stickers! Postcards! a Beer Mat and a Pin-Badge! Wow. It can only be a bumper-sized pack of Tado-Tat!
These packs are big-value awesomeness and are generally made up of a mixture of glossy postcards, die-cut vinyl and paper stickers and whatever else we have lurking around our studio at the time! 
Supplied bagged with header card.

name: TADO Sticker Pack!
description:
Everyone loves stickers! 
Our sticker packs are back and these ones are the premium vinyl badboy versions! All 8 stickers in this pack are die cut, mulitcolour, silkscreen printed on all weather white vinyl. 
These new packs feature 4 classic TADO designs, and 4 brand new ones!
Sizes: 45-90mm
Supplied bagged with header card.

name: Silver & Black Screenprint
description:
2 Colour screenprint for the Silver and Black exhibition at the Archipelago Gallery in Sheffield. 

2-colour Metallic Silver & Matte Black hand-pulled screenprint
250gsm Keaykolour Recycled Clay White paperstock
 Edition of 20 
Signed & Numbered

Prints will ship in a tube for protection.
All UK orders will be sent by 1st Class Recorded mail and all international orders by standard Air Mail. 
Special Delivery service for UK orders is an additional £3.  
Airsure service (tracked / insured) for international orders is an additional £5.30
If you would like to have one of these delivery options please check out as normal and drop us an email to: orders@tado.co.uk after which we can arrange this for you. Thank you! :):)

name: 'SUGOI!' A1 Litho Print & Free Sticker!
description: "SUGOI!!" This huge poster started out as a piece we did for Virgin about things to do in Japan. We then remixed it and spent many days adding in more details and fond memories until we were almost blind. Posters bought from the TADO-Shop also include a free Ramen Monster sticker only available here! For each poster we sell on the TADO-Shop we will donate £5 to the Weston Park Hospital Cancer Charity here in sheffield to help support the incredible work they do. Here's the specs: A1 (841 x 594mm) Full colour litho-printed poster on 170gsm Amadeus satin paper. Edition of 300.

name: Fortune Pork Series 2 Poster!
description:
Full colour A3 Porkie-Poster! Officially one of the brightest things in the TADOShop.
Will bring fun and bounce to any room!

Full colour poster print on satin stock.
Size: 29.7cm x 42cm

name: "Think About It" Book
description:
Published by Dorling Kindersley in 2011 'Think About It' is an encyclopedia of all the big questions in life! We worked with the DK team on illustrating the entire book and it's available from all good bookshops and online bookshops. 


Taken from the DK website: 
What is the secret of happiness? Can computers think? Why do we dream? Think About It has all the answers to the big questions that make you think about yourself and your place in the world. Each page focuses on one big question that will stretch your brain and fire your imagination into the realms of discovery. From questions about personality, thoughts, and dreams to the wider questions of life, the universe, and everything else.
This is a journey of discovery like no other and you'll find all the answers here!

Review by:****** 26 May 2011
'This is a great book that''s aimed at children aged 10 upwards but would also be useful for teenagers and even adults (especially when asked those "interesting" questions that always seem to come up at the most embarassing time!). The answers are nicely balanced, showing that different points of view are equally valid, and very interesting. The only possible downside is that the artwork is so amazing, it can distract from the words - I spent just as long looking at the images as reading the answers!'

Format: Hardback
ISBN: 9781405365192
Size: 216 x 276mm
Pages : 128
Publication date: 01 Mar 2011
Publisher: Dorling Kindersley

name: Mathmos Space Projector Celebrations Slide Pack
description: Mathmos Space Projector Light with Graphic Slide Packs When used with graphic slide packs Space Projector creates a static image of up to 1.5m in diameter on a walls or ceilings. There are 3 different coloured projectors; silver, translucent and black. Each projector comes with a Slide pack of your choice. There are currently 2 packs to choose from; Fairy Tales and Celebrations by Tado. Each pack comes with 4 graphic slides. Replacement parts, including bulbs are available from Mathmos on an ongoing basis. PLEASE READ: This item is for sale via the Mathmos website NOT through this shop page. Click Here to visit! Thank you!

name: Toyshrine IPhone/IPod App
description: A Toy Shrine in your iPhone or iPod An exclusive selection of toy photographs and illustrations curated by doc18. The Toy Shrine showcases doc18's much loved toy photographs and some of his favourite artists' artworks, to brighten up your day and to be used as your iPhone/iPod wallpaper and lock screen. Spread the happiness and send them to your friends and family. Featured artists: 64Colors, Delme, Jonathan Edwards, Nerderella, Olive47, Peskimo, Squink!, TADO, Uamou & Veggiesomething Get it for free at an Itunes Store near you now, and check out Doc18's website for more info! Thank you!

name: Surface Collection Pot
description:
Produced by our good friends at Domestic.fr as part of their 'Surface Collection'.
Big ceramic pot with wrap around design measuring 16cm x 19cm.
Great for putting useful things in!

International orders please note: This item is heavy. We are happy to ship worldwide, but it is a pricey!

name: Domestic Wall Stickers
description: The guys from Domestic in Paris make all kinds of amazing products to cheer up your living space. We've collaborated with them many times and these vinyl wall stickers are best sellers! There's various designs in the range, all available from Domestic.fr PLEASE READ: This item is for sale via the Domestic website NOT through this shop page. Click Here to visit! Thank you!

name: Domestic Scenic Wallpapers
description: GIGANTIC wall murals from the genius' at Domestic. Limited edition to 100 numbered and signed pieces a year 372 x 300 cm. Can be cut to fit your wall dimensions There's various designs in the range, all available from Domestic.fr PLEASE READ: This item is for sale via the Domestic website NOT through this shop page. Click Here to visit! Thank you!

name: "Black forest moment" Domestic Wallpaper Clock
description: A TADO take on the classic Blackforest Cuckoo clock. Produced by the lovely folk at Domestic.fr, this is a wallpaper print that includes a clock to make a fun and functioning decorative item. 3 different colourways available. Size: 250cm x 46.5 cm PLEASE READ: This item is for sale via the Domestic website NOT through this shop page. Click Here to visit! Thank you!

name: Domestic Mirrors
description: Lazer-cut acrylic mirrors by the masters of making stuff Domestic! 3 Different Designs available. PLEASE READ: This item is for sale via the Domestic website NOT through this shop page. Click Here to visit! Thank you!
